entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as slipping out of her bunk and moving towards Ron with a determined expression. She is also mentioned as being angry and upset.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as having a pale face and giving a weak, hopeful smile when Hermione approaches him. He is also mentioned as backing away from Hermione's punches.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as reacting instinctively to Hermione's anger and casting the Protego spell to protect Ron.

relationships.description: Hermione attacks Ron with punches, indicating a strong negative emotion towards him.
Harry tries to calm down Hermione when she is angry and upset.
